titles.title: To exempt semiconductors from the country of origin marking requirements under the Tariff Act of 1930.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E561)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt semiconductors from the country of origin marking requirements under such Act.
